text: Kusum Kusum Prem is a Bangladeshi Bengali language movie. It was released 2011. The movie directed by Mushfiqur Rahman Gulzar who also wrote the story. The movie produced by Impress Telefilm Limited. The movie stars Moushumi, Ferdous and Riaz in lead roles. ==Accolades== ; National Film Awards (for the year 2011) Ferdous Ahmed and Emon Saha has been judged as best actor for his outstanding performance in the film Kusum Kusum Prem. *Won. Best actor: Ferdous *Won. Best composer: Emon Saha ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Bengali-language movies Category:Bangladeshi movies Category:2011 drama movies
title: Kusum Kusum Prem
